description: High Speed USB 2.0 SDHC/MMC Memory Card Reader & Writer (Clear Blue): the Memory Card Reader & Writer serves as an ideal connect between your memory cards and your PC. With the High Speed USB 2.0 SDHC Memory Card Reader & Writer, you can easily and conveniently transfer photos, music, graphics, video games and all other data files between your memory cards and PC. The High Speed USB 2.0 SDHC Memory Card Reader & Writer supports SD, MMC, microSD/TF, miniSD and high capacity "HC" memory cards. Simply plug the High Speed USB 2.0 SDHC Memory Card Reader into a USB port on your computer or laptop directly. Compatible With Motorola Evo 4G Studio 1537 Inspire 4G Sensation 4G G14 Optimus S LS670 Epic 4G SPH-D700 Captivate i897 Galaxy S II I9100 Infuse 4G i997 Galaxy S 4G SGH-T959V
title: DMS 6-in-1 USB 2.0 High Speed Memory Card Reader Writer for SD SDHC MiniSD MiniSDHC MMC rsMMC
